commit.message: Rename `pyglet.matrix` to `pyglet.math`.
Simplification of `pyglet.matrix.Mat4` class.

Merge branch 'pyglet-1.5-maintenance'

# Conflicts:
#	pyglet/shapes.py
Reorganized `pyglet.matrix` and started creation of unit tests.

Inline compact __invert__ calculation (~matrix).
Remove * matrix multiplication to avoid confusion, and recommend @ operator.

Comments on inverse. Row operations optimized using slicing instead of for loops. (#245)

* Comments to inverse. Row operations using slicing.

A bit more explanation on inverse.
Row operations use slicing to be faster.

* Inverse comment typo

Row operations use slicing to be faster.

* Inverse comment typo

commit.message: matrix module: Cleanup, and add __sub__, __invert__ and other operators.

Added transpose, invert, some row operations for Mat4 (#243)

In-depth comments coming later.
Passed some simple test; more may be needed in case somethings wrong.
Transpose could potentially quicken inverse if matrix passes a certain condition (more research needed) --> in some cases the transpose of a matrix is the inverse.
Row operations used in invert.

In-depth comments coming later.
Passed some simple test; more may be needed in case somethings wrong.
Transpose could potentially quicken inverse if matrix passes a certain condition (more research needed) --> in some cases the transpose of a matrix is the inverse.
Row operations used in invert.

commit.message: Fix darwin_hid modifying dictionary during iteration. #237
Add initial components for the `pyglet.gui` module.
more tests
Added Rumble methods to the GameController base class.
Fix shapes.Circle having incorrect number of verts when invisible.

Create events_key_state_handler.py (#240)

* Create events_key_state_handler.py

As intended in #239, this PR proposes creating another example of using KeyStateHandler.

* Updated 'update' functions parameters

Instead of using *args as a parameter, now dt is used.

* Removed old docstrings

* Updated docstring

Create events_key_state_handler.py (#240)

* Create events_key_state_handler.py

As intended in #239, this PR proposes creating another example of using KeyStateHandler.

* Updated 'update' functions parameters

Instead of using *args as a parameter, now dt is used.

* Removed old docstrings

* Updated docstring

commit.message: Add Shader for `shapes` module and get it working on `master`.
Roll back unintentionally modified image module from recent 1.x series merge.
Experimental BorderedRectangle shape.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:pyglet/pyglet

Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/pyglet-1.5-maintenance'

# Conflicts:
#	doc/programming_guide/media.rst
#	pyglet/__init__.py
#	pyglet/gl/__init__.py
#	pyglet/graphics/__init__.py
#	pyglet/image/__init__.py
#	pyglet/libs/darwin/cocoapy/runtime.py
#	pyglet/media/codecs/base.py
#	pyglet/media/codecs/ffmpeg.py

Squashed commit of the following:

Author: Benjamin Moran <benmoran@protonmail.com>
Date:   Mon Jun 22 18:39:58 2020 +0900

    Update RELEASE_NOTES for new Codecs registry class.

Author: Benjamin Moran <benmoran@protonmail.com>

    Fixed crash in OBJ decoder if file is invalid.

    Simplify more Encoders and Decoders by reusing code.

commit 800b388702c6bace4f61ef4794237423a4844d60
Author: Benjamin Moran <benmoran@protonmail.com>
Date:   Thu May 28 20:39:33 2020 +0900

    Consolidate Codec logic into pyglet.util.Codecs
Prepare 1.5.7 release.
Prevent spurious __del__ errors in DirectSound buffer and Wave decoder.

commit.message:
Added QoL properties to ScissorGroup. (#227)

* Added properties to ScissorGroup:

x, y, width, height.

* Added anchor constants to pyglet.text.

Docs may need to be updated.

* Removed stray commit.

* Removed __eq__ and __hash__.

* Extended docstring.

* Removed properties and added area property.

commit.message: Ready 1.5.6 release
Add missing window.mouse documentation, and fix a few other documentation issues.
Add glScissor example, including custom Group.
